name: dnsmasq-config
description: dnsmasq configuration for local DNS resolution
content:
# dnsmasq configuration for HomeLab

# Listen on all interfaces
listen-address={{ip}}
listen-address=127.0.0.1

# Don't read /etc/hosts
no-hosts

# Don't read /etc/resolv.conf
no-resolv

# Use Google DNS as upstream
server=8.8.8.8
server=8.8.4.4

# Local domain resolution
address=/{{domain}}/{{ip}}
address=/.{{domain}}/{{ip}}

# Cache settings
cache-size=1000

# Log queries for debugging
log-queries
log-facility=/var/log/dnsmasq.log
